nodes.documentation:
@notice Creates a lend request that other users can fund.
@dev Locks the endorsed money for a time, if there is no lending cancel the request. The requester can only request half of what is endorsed.
nodes.name: requestLending

declineEndorsement(address).details: The user can't have a lending to be declined. The amount endorsed is returned to the staker.

params._endorsed: The user that gets the endorsment removed.

endorseUser(address,uint256).details: the user needs to have stake available to endorse.

params._amount: amount to be endorsed the user.
params._endorsed: The user that gets the endorsment.

requestLending().details: Locks the endorsed money for a time, if there is no lending cancel the request. The requester can only request half of what is endorsed.

stakeMoney().details: increase the amount staked and the amount available to endorse.

withdrawStakeMoney(uint256).details: the amount can't be lended or endorsed in order to withdraw.

params._amount: amount to be returned to the owner.

declineEndorsement(address).notice: Removes the endorsement of an user.

endorseUser(address,uint256).notice: Endorse an user with an amount.

getLender(address).notice: Gets the amount stacked by an user.

getStakedAmount(address).notice: Gets the amount stacked by an user.

getUserEndorsers(address).notice: Gets the array of addresses that endorsed an user.

requestLending().notice: Creates a lend request that other users can fund.
